text: Gitega is one of the 18 provinces of Burundi. Its capital city is Gitega, which is also the national capital. Burundi National Museum is in the province. == Communes == Gitega Province is divided into 11 communes: * Commune of Bugendana * Commune of Bukirasazi * Commune of Buraza * Commune of Giheta * Commune of Gishubi * Commune of Gitega * Commune of Itaba * Commune of Makebuko * Commune of Mutaho * Commune of Nyanrusange * Commune of Ryansoro ==References== Category:Provinces of Burundi
title: Gitega Province
